alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Grafton (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 19 at 4:57AM EST until December 20 at 4:32AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in New Hampshire... Pemigewasset River At Plymouth affecting Grafton and Belknap Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pemigewasset River at Plymouth. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 20.1 feet, Flood waters up to the doors of the PSU physical education center and the PSU ice arena. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:30 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 20.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 4:30 AM EST Tuesday was 20.6 feet, which occurred around midnight. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this evening and continue falling to 3.2 feet early Friday morning. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
